title: Police unveil rental vehicle selling racket
paragraphs: A 32-year-old man has been arrested by the Nugegoda Divisional Crime Investigation Unit for engaging in selling rented out vehicles stealthily were hired from car rental companies.
The suspect identified as Pramuditha Araliya Wickramasinghe, a resident of Kotugodella in Kandy.
Police Spokesman SDIG Ajith Rohana said the suspect has gone missing after renting out a vehicle worth in the range of Rs. 5 million from a rent-a-car dealer in Homagama.
It was revealed that the documents provided by him also found to have been fake.
Following the investigations, the spokesman said that 48 complaints have been received with regards to the fraud committed by the suspect.

To avoid such crime, SDIG Rohana said it is more appropriate to take a photograph of the persons who come to avail such services, as forged documents could be submitted by them when renting vehicles.(DSB)
